entry.title: Southland - 2 Lbs Food Trays #200 - 250 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Southland
Type: Disposables
Price: 14.99

Serve a wide variety of tasty finger foods, freshly made sides, and signature snacks with this Southland -  2 Lbs Food Trays #200

Versatile in both design and use, this tray is great for French fries, chicken tenders, mozzarella sticks, and other popular fried favorites. It's even great with cold items such as veggies, fruit, and pasta salad! The one-piece board construction ensures sturdy and reliable use, while the open top design allows users to effortlessly top off their tray with assorted sauces, dips, and condiments. Plus, an eye-catching, geometric cornerstone design adds extra appeal to your food presentations.

Eco-Friendly Design

These trays are easily disposable when your event has concluded. Plus, they can be composted or recycled, making them ideal for any eco-conscious consumer.

These Red Plaid food trays are made from a sheet of poly-coated board. Ready for a  wide variety of uses like poutine, french fries, hot dogs and fast food servings.

entry.title: CKF - Savaday #300 Pulp Fiber Food Tray 21565 - 500 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: CKF
Type: Disposables
Price: 60.49

CKF - Savaday #300 Pulp Fiber Food Tray 21565 is disposable pulp food tray is made from extra strong molded fiber, which is 100% reclaimed, certified compostable and processed chlorine free. This versatile molded fiber tray is perfect for fried, baked or broiled foods and it enhances their visual appeal. It has superior oil absorbing properties so that it is able to keep the "crisp" in crispy fried foods. The molded fiber tray is rectangular- shaped with rounded corners.

A great eco-friendly choice for your establishment, this tray is made from strong molded fiber and 100% recycled material. This makes it a great way to promote your green image to customers in comparison to foam or plastic alternatives! The strong design has a molded feel and texture that offers an easy grip. For optimal serving results, be sure to put down deli paper before placing food on the tray.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Southland
Type: Disposables
Price: 59.99

Serve a wide variety of tasty finger foods, freshly made sides, and signature snacks with this Southland -  5 Lbs Food Tray #500

9" x 4 3/4" x 2 9/16", 5 LB

Versatile in both design and use, this tray is great for French fries, chicken tenders, mozzarella sticks, and other popular fried favorites. It's even great with cold items such as veggies, fruit, and pasta salad! The one-piece board construction ensures sturdy and reliable use, while the open top design allows users to effortlessly top off their tray with assorted sauces, dips, and condiments. Plus, an eye-catching, geometric cornerstone design adds extra appeal to your food presentations.

Eco-Friendly Design

These trays are easily disposable when your event has concluded. Plus, they can be composted or recycled, making them ideal for any eco-conscious consumer.

These Red Plaid food trays are made from a sheet of poly-coated board. Ready for a  wide variety of uses like poutine, french fries, hot dogs and fast food servings.
